text: Nilufar (نیلوفر) is the Persian word for water lily, derived from the Sanskrit word for blue lotus, nīlotpala (नीलोत्पल). It is a popular feminine given name in Greater Iran. The term may refer to: ==Given name== *Nilufar Niftaliyeva, Azerbaijani individual rhythmic gymnast *Nilufar Usmonova, Uzbek singer and actress *Nilufar Yasmin, Bangladeshi singer ==Places== *Sarab-e Nilufar, village in Baladarband Rural District, in the Central District of Kermanshah County, Kermanshah Province, Iran *Shahrak-e Sarab Nilufar, village in Baladarband Rural District, in the Central District of Kermanshah County, Kermanshah Province, Iran ==See also== *Nilüfer (disambiguation) Category:Feminine given names
title: Nilufar
